title: uNDO unnaippOl
sahitya:
uNDO unnaippOl aNDinOrai aNaivOr daNDAyudanE inda aNDam anaittilum


anupallavi

  deNDaniTTa undanaDi tEDi vandaDaiyum toNDariDam karuNai koNDiDum ayyE


caraNam    tunbamurum anbar inbamura undanai ten pazhani tannil darishikka vandadum
anbODu annArin allalgaL ellAm aDiyODu maraiyavE tuDaittiDum iraivA
